info.title: Get SEC Filings Data
info.description: Fetches the latest 10-Q HTML report and 10-K Excel financials for public companies. Supports alias learning, fuzzy matching, and GitHub-persistent mapping for better CIK resolution.

get.description: Returns the latest 10-Q HTML report and the most recent 10-K Excel file (if available). Accepts company name, alias, or ticker symbol.

parameters.name: company_name
parameters.description: Public company name, known alias, or ticker symbol (e.g., Amazon, AMZN, Meta, RH).

200.description: Returns matched company name, CIK, latest 10-Q, and 10-K Excel link (if found).

Matched Company Name.description: SEC-registered name that matches the user's query.

CIK.description: The resolved Central Index Key used for fetching SEC filings.

10-Q Filing.description: Direct URL to the latest available 10-Q HTML report (or null if not found).

10-K Excel.description: Direct URL to the latest available 10-K Excel financials (or null if not found).

404.description: No matching CIK or filings found.
